summary: Wolfram Research is making its computational technology available as a foundation tool for LLM systems, extending AI capabilities beyond language processing to include mathematical computation and symbolic reasoning. This integration positions Wolfram as infrastructure for next-generation AI applications.
content:
Article URL: https://writings.stephenwolfram.com/2026/02/making-wolfram-tech-available-as-a-foundation-tool-for-llm-systems/

zh.title: 将 Wolfram 技术作为 LLM 系统的基础工具提供
zh.summary: Wolfram Research 将其计算技术作为 LLM 系统的基础工具提供，将 AI 能力扩展到数学计算和符号推理，超越语言处理。这一集成将 Wolfram 定位为下一代 AI 应用的基础设施。

ja.title: WolframテクノロジーをLLMシステムの基礎ツールとして利用可能にする
ja.summary: Wolfram Researchは、計算技術をLLMシステムの基盤ツールとして利用可能にし、言語処理を超えた数学計算と記号推論を含むAI機能を拡張している。この統合は、次世代AI応用のインフラストラクチャとしてWolframを位置づけている。

ko.title: Wolfram 기술을 LLM 시스템의 기초 도구로 제공
ko.summary: Wolfram Research가 계산 기술을 LLM 시스템의 기초 도구로 제공하여 AI 기능을 언어 처리를 넘어 수학 계산과 기호 추론으로 확장한다. 이 통합은 Wolfram을 차세대 AI 애플리케이션의 인프라로 위치시킨다.

fr.title: Mettre la technologie Wolfram à disposition en tant qu'outil fondamental pour les systèmes LLM
fr.summary: Wolfram Research met sa technologie informatique à disposition en tant qu'outil fondamental pour les systèmes LLM, étendant les capacités de l'IA au-delà du traitement du langage pour inclure le calcul mathématique et le raisonnement symbolique. Cette intégration positionne Wolfram comme infrastructure pour les applications IA de prochaine génération.

de.title: Wolfram-Technologie als Grundwerkzeug für LLM-Systeme verfügbar machen
de.summary: Wolfram Research stellt seine Rechentechnologie als Grundwerkzeug für LLM-Systeme zur Verfügung und erweitert KI-Fähigkeiten über die Sprachverarbeitung hinaus auf mathematische Berechnungen und symbolisches Denken. Diese Integration positioniert Wolfram als Infrastruktur für nächstgenerative KI-Anwendungen.

es.title: Disponibilizar la tecnología Wolfram como herramienta fundamental para sistemas LLM
es.summary: Wolfram Research pone su tecnología computacional a disposición como herramienta fundamental para sistemas LLM, extendiendo las capacidades de IA más allá del procesamiento del lenguaje para incluir cálculo matemático y razonamiento simbólico. Esta integración posiciona a Wolfram como infraestructura para aplicaciones de IA de próxima generación.

title: “Car Wash” test with 53 models
summary: Testing 53 AI models on a simple logic puzzle revealed only 5 models can answer consistently across 10 runs, with most performing below human baseline (71.5% chose correctly). This demonstrates reasoning limitations even among leading proprietary models including GPT-5 and Claude Sonnet 4.5.
content:
"I Want to Wash My Car. The Car Wash Is 50 Meters Away. Should I Walk or Drive?" This question has been making the rounds as a simple AI logic test so I wanted to see how it holds up across a broad set of models. Ran 53 models (leading open-source, open-weight, proprietary) with no system prompt, forced choice between drive and walk, with a reasoning field.
On a single run, only 11 out of 53 got it right (42 said walk). But a single run doesn't prove much, so I reran every model 10 times. Same prompt, no cache, clean slate.
The results got worse. Of the 11 that passed the single run, only 5 could do it consistently. GPT-5 managed 7/10. GPT-5.1, GPT-5.2, Claude Sonnet 4.5, every Llama and Mistral model scored 0/10 across all 10 runs.
People kept saying humans would fail this too, so I got a human baseline through Rapidata (10k people, same forced choice): 71.5% said drive. Most models perform below that.
All reasoning traces (ran via Opper, my startup), full model breakdown, human baseline data, and raw JSON files are in the writeup for anyone who wants to dig in or run their own analysis.
Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=47128138
Points: 361
# Comments: 427

zh.title: 53 个 AI 模型的"洗车"测试
zh.summary: 对 53 个 AI 模型进行简单逻辑谜题测试，结果显示仅 5 个模型能在 10 次运行中保持一致，大多数性能低于人类基准线（71.5% 正确率）。这展示了即使是领先专有模型（包括 GPT-5 和 Claude Sonnet 4.5）的推理局限性。

fr.title: Test "Car Wash" avec 53 modèles
fr.summary: Les tests de 53 modèles d'IA sur une simple énigme logique ont révélé que seuls 5 modèles pouvaient répondre de manière cohérente sur 10 passages, la plupart performant en dessous de la ligne de base humaine (71,5% choisis correctement). Ceci démontre les limitations de raisonnement même parmi les modèles propriétaires les plus performants, y compris GPT-5 et Claude Sonnet 4.5.

de.title: "Car Wash"-Test mit 53 Modellen
de.summary: Ein Test von 53 KI-Modellen mit einem einfachen Logikrätsel zeigte, dass nur 5 Modelle in 10 Durchläufen konsistent antworten konnten, wobei die meisten unter der menschlichen Grundlinie abschnitten (71,5% richtig gewählt). Dies demonstriert Reasoning-Limitierungen auch bei führenden proprietären Modellen, einschließlich GPT-5 und Claude Sonnet 4.5.

es.title: Prueba "Car Wash" con 53 modelos
es.summary: Probar 53 modelos de IA en un simple acertijo lógico reveló que solo 5 modelos pueden responder de manera consistente en 10 ejecuciones, con la mayoría teniendo un desempeño por debajo del nivel de referencia humano (71.5% eligieron correctamente). Esto demuestra limitaciones de razonamiento incluso en modelos propietarios líderes, incluidos GPT-5 y Claude Sonnet 4.5.

L'incident soulève des questions sur les procédures de conformité interne, les protections des employés dénonciateurs et la surveillance réglementaire des principaux échanges de crypto-monnaies.

Der Vorfall wirft Fragen zu internen Compliance-Verfahren, zum Schutz von Mitarbeitern, die Verstöße melden, und zur regulatorischen Aufsicht großer Kryptowährungsbörsen auf.

title: The Missing Semester of Your CS Education – Revised for 2026
summary: MIT's revised Missing Semester course now addresses AI-powered development tools, agentic coding, and code quality, reflecting six years of field evolution since the original 2020 course.
content:
We returned to MIT last month to teach a revised version of Missing Semester, six years after the original debut (which has been extensively discussed on HN, in https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22226380 and https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=34934216).
We’ve updated the course based on our personal experiences as well as major changes in the field (e.g., the proliferation of AI-powered developer tools) over the past several years. The 2026 course includes revised versions of four lectures from the previous course, and it adds five entirely new lectures:
- Development Environment and Tools
- Packaging and Shipping Code
- Agentic Coding
- Beyond the Code (soft skills)
- Code Quality
We’d love to hear any feedback from the HN community to improve the current or future iterations of the course. In particular, we’re curious to hear the community’s take on our inclusion of AI-related topics (e.g., dedicating an entire class to the topic of agentic coding; though we tried to counterbalance it with plenty of disclaimers, and a dedicated section on AI etiquette in Beyond the Code).
--Anish, Jon, and Jose
Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=47124171
Points: 422
# Comments: 120
